patterns: How do I register my company?
Can I register my company on this portal?
How to sign up as a company?
responses: To register your company, go to the registration page and fill out the necessary details. Once submitted, your registration will be reviewed and approved by the admin.
You can register your company by clicking on 'Register' and selecting 'Company Registration'. Fill out the form with your company details and submit for approval.
Visit the registration page, select 'Company', and provide the required information. Your registration will be processed and approved by the admin.
To sign up as a company, navigate to the registration section, choose 'Company', and enter your details. The admin will approve your registration shortly.
Registering your company is easy. Go to the 'Register' page, select 'Company', fill in the details, and submit. The admin will review and approve your registration.

patterns: How do I log in as a company?
Log in to my company account
responses: To log in as a company, go to the login page and enter your company credentials.
You can access your company account by clicking on 'Login' and entering your company username and password.
Log in to your company account through the 'Login' page using your registered email and password.
To access the company dashboard, visit the login page and enter your company login details.
Enter your company credentials on the login page to access your company account.

patterns: How do I post a job?
Can I post a job listing?
I want to add a job
responses: To post a job, go to the 'Employer Dashboard' and click 'Post a Job'. Fill in the job details and submit.
You can add a job listing by visiting the 'Employer' section and selecting 'Post a Job'. Complete the form and publish your job listing.
Go to 'Post a Job' in the employer dashboard, enter the job information, and submit your listing.
To post a job, log in to your employer account, navigate to 'Post Job', fill out the required fields, and submit.
Visit the 'Employer Dashboard', click 'Add Job', provide the job details, and post your listing.

patterns: How do I manage job applications?
responses: To manage job applications, go to the 'Employer Dashboard' and click on 'Manage Applications'. You can view and review all applications received.
You can view and manage job applications by navigating to 'Manage Applications' in the employer section.
To check job applications, visit the 'Employer Dashboard' and select 'Applications'. Review and manage the applications received.
Log in to your employer account, go to 'Applications', and you can view, review, and manage all job applications.
Visit the 'Manage Applications' section in the employer dashboard to review and manage applications for your job listings.

patterns: How do I schedule an interview?
responses: To schedule an interview, go to the 'Manage Applications' section, select an application, and click 'Schedule Interview'. Enter the date, time, and location, and send the invitation.
You can schedule an interview by selecting a job application in the 'Applications' section and clicking 'Schedule Interview'. Fill in the interview details and send the invite.
Go to the 'Manage Applications' page, choose an applicant, and click 'Schedule Interview'. Enter the interview details and send the invitation.
To set up an interview, navigate to the 'Applications' section, select an applicant, and click 'Schedule Interview'. Provide the interview details and send the invite.
Log in to your employer account, go to 'Manage Applications', select an application, and click 'Schedule Interview'. Enter the necessary details and send the interview invitation.

patterns: How do I view job applications?
responses: To view job applications, go to the 'Employer Dashboard' and click on 'Manage Applications'. You can see all the applications received.
You can view job applications by navigating to the 'Applications' section in the employer dashboard.
To check job applications, visit the 'Employer Dashboard' and select 'Manage Applications'. Review the received applications there.
Log in to your employer account, go to 'Applications', and you can view all job applications received for your listings.
Visit the 'Manage Applications' section in the employer dashboard to view and review applications for your job listings.

patterns: How do I update my profile?
Can I edit my profile information?
responses: To update your profile, go to the 'My Profile' section and click 'Edit'.
You can edit your profile information by navigating to 'Account Settings' and selecting 'Edit Profile'.
Update your account details in the 'Profile' section under settings.
Go to 'My Profile' and click 'Edit' to update your information.
For profile updates, visit the 'Account Settings' and choose 'Edit Profile'.
We offer various subscription plans including monthly, and yearly options.
Yes, we have subscription plans. You can choose between monthly, and annual memberships.
Our subscription options include monthly, and yearly plans with different benefits.
Subscription plans are available on a monthly, and yearly basis. Each plan comes with specific features.
We provide different membership plans: monthly, and yearly. Each plan has its own benefits.

patterns: How do I generate a report?
responses: To generate a report, go to the 'Reports' section in the employer dashboard, select the type of report you need, and click 'Generate'.
You can create a report by visiting the 'Reports' section, selecting the desired report type, and clicking 'Generate'.
To generate a report, navigate to the 'Reports' section in your employer dashboard and choose the report you want to create.
Go to the 'Reports' section, select the type of report, and click 'Generate' to create a new report.
Log in to your employer account, visit the 'Reports' section, and generate the required report by following the prompts.

responses: Sure, what type of job are you looking for?
What industry or position are you interested in?
Can you specify the job title or field you are interested in?

Let's find a job for you. What are your preferences?
